FlavorText: A decayed fragment from a Cecil's journal.
Name: Mold-spotted Journal Fragment
NoticeSignText:
I saw Eadar again at the shoals. She said nothing to me, only stared at me with the same eyes I see looking out of our daughterâ€™s face. 
I think I prefer the yelling and pleading. In her silence I can hear my own guilt, and it is unbearable.
